Posts.Content: I am completely Digital at this point. I have several doctors that are part of a large University medical Center. The patient Portal has everything I could need and my doctors can slso seesny labs or imaging I have recently had. This information is also readily available in the ER.I do keep disk of some of my imaging and if neccessary will out a report. Thoe are kept by specialist.
Posts.Title: Mastering your medical paperwork: Tips from a professional organizer
